content:
PropertyTypes Enum

Definition

Specifies the property types to select when calling the stem.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema.FindAllProperties(System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.PropertyTypes) method.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum PropertyTypes
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
PropertyTypes

Fields

Indexed

A property that is indexed.
InGlobalCatalog

A property that is replicated in the global catalog.
